snippet.title: Cultist Simulator launch trailer: PENETRATE THE HOUSE
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam (https://bit.ly/2ktS26i) and sign up to the mailing list 
(https://bit.ly/2I627N7 )!

Also launching on Humble (https://bit.ly/2GvtQuu), GOG (https://bit.ly/2ICwr2i) and itch.io 
(https://bit.ly/2jWgHNA).

☽★☾

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

Cultist Simulator is a game of apocalypse and yearning from Alexis Kennedy, creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. Play as a seeker after unholy mysteries, in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories.

http://weatherfactory.biz/
